message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM 

This paper deals with the problem of grounding phrases in images, which is a task related to computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper uses a large collection of linguistic cues, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses machine learning techniques to learn weights for combining cues, which could place it in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on two datasets, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia).
